title: Aldis
description: Aldis is an Epic Fantasy set in the land of Penwel.Jocelyne's happy, but dull, life is completely shattered in one sunny afternoon.Fleeing from unknown pursuers, she finds herself in another world and discovers a family she never knew existed, including a twin brother with whom she shares an unusual connection. Before Jocelyne can settle into her new surroundings, where she is suddenly an important figure and magic is an accepted part of life, an old enemy resurfaces and the teenage girl must rely on a young bodyguard she hardly knows in order to save herself and her new found family.The story is clean and there are some elements of romance.
author: L.  Walker
